helpmelogin:
There are many thousands of HiLearning sites around the world. This app can only connect to HiLearning sites that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.

If you can't connect to your HiLearning site then you need to contact a HiLearning administrator at the place where you want to connect and ask them to read http://docs.hivitrin.com/

To test the app in a HiLearning demo site type teacher or student in the Site URL field and click the Add button.
